snippet: Defending French Open champion Stan Wawrinka avoided a repeat on Wednesday of his first-round scare, though he was still made to work hard in a straight-sets win over Japan's Taro Daniel....
lead_paragraph: Defending French Open champion Stan Wawrinka avoided a repeat on Wednesday of his first-round scare, though he was still made to work hard in a straight-sets win over Japan's Taro Daniel.

headline.print_headline: Tennis: Holder Wawrinka Picks Up the Pace
headline.main: Tennis: Holder Wawrinka Picks Up the Pace
